Personio - Engineering - Full-Time - NYC (hybrid 2-3 days)

We're one of Europe's largest Unicorns that provides an all-in-one solution for HR, and we've recently expanded our tech presence to the US, with an office conveniently located across the street from Moynihan Train Hall in NYC.

As part of a larger initiative to establish a solid technical foundation for growth to IPO and beyond, I recently joined to build out a platform to provide reliable, scalable, and governed access to all of the data used by our products.

If you have a passion for building software platforms, thrive in ambiguity, and are interested in taking projects from ideation to operation, then you could be a Staff Engineer that I'm looking for to join my org: https://personio.jobs.personio.de/job/1461433?display=en
